uvi.description:
virtio-blk: Fix memory leak among suspend/resume procedure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.134 by commit 04c6e60b884cb5e94ff32af46867fb41d5848358. For more details please see the references link.
